bibl.title: A Case of Imprisonment?
bibl.note: Found in the Theban Tomb 65, during the Hungarian excavations. Personal letter most probably from one monk to the other: a case of locking someone up is mentioned.

bibl.title: Studies Presented to Róbert Simon on the Occasion of his 75th Birthday

bibl.seg: Andrea Hasznos, A Case of Imprisonment?
Monika Pesthy-Simon (ed.), Studies Presented to Róbert Simon on the Occasion of his 75th Birthday = Fontes orientales (Budapest, 2014) pp. 9-14.
Found in the Theban Tomb 65, during the Hungarian excavations. Personal letter most probably from one monk to the other: a case of locking someone up is mentioned.
